Class ModificationsCLIInputBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.compomics.cli.modifications.ModificationsCLIInputBean

  • public class ModificationsCLIInputBean
extends Object
    This class parses the parameters from an EnzymeCLI.

    Marc Vaudel
